title: Favorite Project
heading: My most enjoyable DIY project!
shortDesc:
This project dates back to 2012. While the house itself wasnâ€™t built as a DIY project, I was heavily involved in every step of the process.
I personally designed the layout, drafted the blueprint, and meticulously planned every detail.
description:
With the skilled assistance of masons, I was able to turn my vision into reality, making it an incredibly fulfilling experience! 
Of course, there are some mistakes & drawbacks, but overall, it has been an invaluable learning experience!
